title: MariaDB
subTitle: Designing and maintaining efficient relational databases
overviewContent: MariaDB has been used to design, set up, and maintain relational databases supporting web-based applications. Work includes writing and optimising SQL queries, creating stored procedures, and structuring data for efficient integration with MVC-based backend systems. Database design was tailored to support application performance, reliability, and maintainability. Collaboration with development teams ensured seamless data flow and smooth system functionality across multiple projects, from dashboards to intranet systems.

relatedProjects.projectName: H & H Lawyers Website and Server Migration
